data: It was close upon half-past six and the evening shadows were growing denser when two soldiers reached the little space, planted with trees, opposite the Musée Galliéra, where the Rue de Chaillot and the Rue Pierre-Charron meet.
Musée Galliéra | Rue de Chaillot | Rue Pierre-Charron
The Golden Triangle: The Return of Arsène Lupin
